channel.title: Interpolation on Hugo Grimoire

item.title: FILM
item.description: FILM GitHub Setup GPU environment The Windows instructions are wrong or outdated. Tensorflow kept trying to use the CPU instead of the GPU until I installed CUDA and CUDNN this way: ```Shell conda install -c conda-forge cudatoolkit=11.2 cudnn=8.1.0 python -m pip install "tensorflow<2.11" pip install protobuf==3.20.3 ``` Usage Activate the Conda environment ```Shell conda activate frame_interpolation ``` From the Conda Shell, cd to the FILM directory ```Shell cd C:\Users\trima\FILM ``` Place the images you would like to interpolate in the "
